citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection the facility could not provide a written program of veterinary care. A completed written program of
veterinary care ensures clear and accurate communication between the facility and the attending veterinarian regarding
care of animals. The facility must have a current and completed program of veterinary care available for review during
inspections. Each exhibitor must employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time
attending veterinarian, the formal arrangements must include a written program of veterinary care.
Correct by July 1, 2025.

The 2 layers of mesh wire outside of the groundhog’s primary enclosure contained a build-up of dirt, straw, and other
debris. Contaminated surfaces that the animals are closely adjacent to may contribute to or cause illness. The facility
must ensure that the premises are kept clean and in good repair.
Correct by July 30, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
